system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.

description.value:
The Field Chirurgeon does not prioritise the saving of lives, but the persistance of them. It is by their actions that the Guardsmen that rely on them keep fighting on in spite of horrific injuries, exhaustion, or illness until their work is done and the Emperor grants them rest.

Effects: Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Field Chirurgeon. Apt: Ballistic Skill, Defence, Fellowship, Intelligence, Knowledge, Willpower Add. Equipment: Diagnosticator, Injector, Medikit, 4 Field Sutures. Gain Talents: Jaded+Meditation or Swift Suture Can Purchase Basic Orders: Rapid Intervention and It's Not as Bad as All That...
